body: At 13th level, an aquatic druid gains DR/slashing or piercing equal to 1/2 her level. This damage reduction also applies against spells and spell-like abilities that inflict damage by grappling or crushing (e.g., black tentacles, crushing hand). She never takes pressure damage from deep water. This ability replaces a thousand faces.
name: Deep Diver
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Aquatic Druid/Deep Diver
